name: .ACCDE File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACCDE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Database file created by Microsoft Access, a desktop relational database program; saves a "locked-down" version of an .ACCDB file so that all Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) code is saved in a compiled format and is not viewable or editable; allows custom database code to be protected.

content: Other functions that cannot be performed in an ACCDE database include modifying forms, reports, and modules.
NOTE: ACCDE files are used in place of .MDE files, which are used by older versions of Access.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
